name: Helston to the Stables Café accessible woodland trail, Penrose

ai.summary: A short, easy 3 km woodland loop from Helston to the Stables Café at Penrose Estate. The trail follows accessible paths through Penrose woodland, ending with a welcoming café stop.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-maintained gravel and compacted earth paths with occasional tree roots. Very gentle gradients; suitable for wheelchairs and strollers on most sections, though some surface irregularities may occur.
ai.safety_notes: - Stay on marked paths and watch for uneven ground, especially after rain. - Be mindful of other walkers, cyclists, and dogs; keep dogs on a short leash. - Check daylight hours and plan to return before dusk. - Bring water and weather-appropriate clothing; carry a mobile phone for emergencies. - If accessibility is a priority, confirm the exact surface of the route at the Stables Café entrance.
recommended_gear: Weather-appropriate clothing (layers, waterproof if rain is possible)
Map or offline navigation for Penrose Estate
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; winter visits are possible but the paths can be muddy and daylight hours shorter.

seo.title: Helston to the Stables Café Accessible Woodland Trail, Penrose — 3 km Easy Walk in Cornwall, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore an easy 3 km woodland loop from Helston to the Stables Café at Penrose Estate. Accessible paths, family-friendly, with a cafe stop.
